comments: His class was very hard, and his tests were even harder. The examples he gave in class were nothing like the questions on the test. His explanation on processes are hard to comprehend. You need to understand concepts completely to understand questions. He doesn\'t curve tests even with class averages of 30 and 50. Very difficult class, unfortunetly.

This professor is NOT worth taking, he expects you come to class with questions! Do NOT waste your money on him!! His examples are even more complicated!! He gives you the scenario, but does not explain plugging in the numerical information. "he want\'s you to learn that on your own" and he has a ridiculous "umm, umm, umm problem!"
Awful, awful, awful. Where ever he goes after ESU, do not take him for any class. Period.

I came into this class after a good understanding in physics 1, which I got a B+ in. Physics 2 is a whole different story. His teaching method is...well...non-existent. I\'m halfway through the semester and I\'ve learned basically NOTHING. GOOD LUCK!

He is rude and has a "teaching" style unlike any prof I\'ve ever had (aka not helpful). Ask him a question and he makes you feel like an idiot for asking in the first place. He only thinks that students deserve an A in the course if they\'re ready to take the MCAT physical science section. ALSO, his homework doesn\'t help you with the quizzes. BEWARE!
Physics 131 is very hard class and ready to work your butt off on the labs. Most of the students got a C\'s in my class.

He is a very cool guy and helps you in lab if your struggling. My only complaint is that it takes him like 20 minutes to go around the room. Its understandable but annoying. Anyway props to him. Good guy overall.

I had him for sound waves and light and his class was somewhat easy.. just buy the chapter guide and get help when you first realize that you\'re confused. Class isn\'t mandatory but he goes over everything in class.so you should go.His class is based on quizzes every week.
Funny guy...go to class because the book doesn\'t help. Kinda hard.
